text: Hi! My name is Giancarlo, and I'm a Front-end Web Developer! I hail from Toronto, Canada, and I currently call London, UK my second home.

I used be a science teacher, but after learning how to code as a hobby, I loved it so much I decided to make it my career. If I have a regret, it's that I didn't start sooner. I'll still blurt out random scientific facts every now and then (ask me about the Limestone Cycle!)

I'm completely self-taught. After learning the basics, I decided to focus on React as I loved how simple it was to create something dynamic. I was fortunate enough to gain experience using React to build a professional project in my first Junior Developer role. I love using new frameworks, technologies and packages though, and in the modern JavaScript landscape we live in I feel spoiled for choice on what to pick next! (Currently: Three.js)

As a developer, I like my code clean, reusable, and easy to understand. I'm also a solid communicator and love explaining how things work. Nothing makes me happier than accomplishing something I couldn't previously do (sometimes I high-five myself at my desk).

In the rare occasions where I'm not by my computer coding or reading about coding, you might find me singing in my local community choir, going for a run, travelling the world,  or cooking up a storm.
